title: BRIEF-Partners REIT going-private transaction with McCowan and Associates
text:
BRIEF-Partners REIT going-private transaction with McCowan and Associates

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 10, 2019 18:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Partners REIT going-private transaction with McCowan and Associates Oct 10 (Reuters) - Partners Real Estate Investment Trust : * PARTNERS REIT GOING-PRIVATE TRANSACTION WITH MCCOWAN AND ASSOCIATES LTD. * PARTNERS REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - MAA WILL ACQUIRE UNITS OF REIT EXCEPT FOR SOME UNITS OWNED BY MAA A FOR A PRICE OF CDN. $0.78 PER UNIT IN CASH * PARTNERS REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT - PURCHASE OF 100% OF EQUITY OF PARTNERS REPRESENTS TOTAL ENTERPRISE VALUE OF ABOUT $102 MILLION * PARTNERS REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES, REIT HAS AGREED TO PAY MAA A TERMINATION FEE OF $1.4 MILLION * PARTNERS REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - A TERMINATION FEE OF $2 MILLION WILL BE PAYABLE BY MAA TO REIT IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES

BRIEF-Partners REIT going-private transaction with McCowan and Associates
description: BRIEF-Partners REIT going-private transaction with McCowan and Associates
